string.text: Produced by a well known Canadian Tobacco Company, smuggled into the Zone by suspicious persons belonging to the 'Narodnaya Solyanka Cult' that has recently been sighted inside the perimeter. Experienced S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s quickly unlearn this detrimental habit in order to be able to run fast enough to escape from the Bloodsuckers, Boars and other mutated creatures found inside the ZONE...
